item.title: Hello World
item.description: I’ve been meaning to change my website from Notion to a dynamic one, so here it goes.

item.title: Start Here
item.description: My name is Emre Colakoglu and I’m a product manager / experienced data analyst working in the intersection of gaming, analytics and automation. I’ll use this website to collect all of my favourite things and my writings. I’m a product manager working on data and machine learning products at Coda Platform. We are building smart products for mobile game creators to take the guesswork out of building successful mobile games. I joined Coda as first employee.
